# AVCaptionRegion.Scroll.rollUp

**Case**

A type that indicates a roll-up scroll effect.

## Declaration

```swift
case rollUp
```

## Scroll values

- **AVCaptionRegion.Scroll.none**: A type that indicates no scrolling.
